EmailTemplate.name: Cleaning and Disinfectants.Cleaning & Disinfectants
EmailTemplate.subject: Protect Your Work Family
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I want to connect with you one last time to continue our discussion on how Grand & Toy can help you navigate the new normal now that golf facilities have reopened. While operations have resumed, protecting your work family should be the utmost importance.
Due to golf having high-touch surfaces and equipment, it will be important that your facility is equipped with the right cleaning solutions. Grand & Toy does carry a wide range of cleaning and disinfecting products <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Cleaning-Maintenance/_/N-dxp?cmp=EBNIAMCLEANINGDISINFECTANT20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> that can be used on these high-touch areas. From disinfectant sprays and wipes <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Disinfectant-Surface-Spray-Wipes-Cleaners/_/N-dyg?cmp=EBNIAMSPRAYSWIPES20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> to paper towels <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Paper-Towels/_/N-dy0?cmp=EBNIAMPAPERTOWELS20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> and much more, Grand & Toy can provide you the cleaning solutions you need at preferential pricing.
If you have any questions or need more information on other products your facility needs, please don’t hesitate to contact me. I’d be happy to help.
Kind regards, Marvin Jean-Pierre Inside Account Manager
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z6
E-mail: MarvinJean-Pierre@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:MarvinJean-Pierre@grandandtoy.com]]> | Toll Free:1-800-348-2184 ext.42540
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
